seo.title: Terms and Conditions & Privacy Policy | {{COMPANY_NAME}}

hero.description: Please read these terms carefully before using our services

sections.heading: Acceptance of Terms of Use
sections.content: By accessing and using the {{COMPANY_NAME}} website or engaging with any content, services, or products offered by {{COMPANY_NAME}}, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions...

sections.heading: Privacy Policy
sections.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which governs your use of the site, to understand our practices...

sections.content: Permission to use and access this website is granted under a limited license, not a transfer of title...
